abstract: The International Lease Finance Corporation signed an agreement with Boeing for an order of 52 new 787 Dreamliners.
snippet: The International Lease Finance Corporation signed an agreement with Boeing for an order of 52 new 787 Dreamliners.
lead_paragraph: PARIS, June 19 — International Lease Finance Corporation, the world’s largest commercial jet leasing company, signed an agreement Tuesday with Boeing for an order of 52 787 Dreamliners, raising the total number of orders for the hot-selling wide-body plane to 634.

headline.print_headline: Leasing Giant Orders 50 Dreamliners, Becoming Biggest User
